description: The Real Properties Operations Detachment (RP Ops) Borden requires a Contractor to supply all labour, materials, transportation and equipment to perform inspection and preventative maintenance and perform basic mechanical and electrical repairs and parts replacement on an ", contract_duration_text:
full_summary:
### Bowling Centre Inspection and Maintenance
#### Tender Number: WS4125553134
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Tender Status: **Cancelled**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a Contractor to provide inspection and maintenance services for the Circled Pine Lanes Bowling Centre. The scope of work includes performing preventive maintenance and basic mechanical and electrical repairs and parts replacement as required to ensure the bowling centre remains in good working order.

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** *SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Region of Delivery:** *Ontario (except NCR)

#### End User Entities
The services will be provided to the Department of National Defence (DND) at the Circled Pine Lanes Bowling Centre.

#### Contact Information
The contact person for this tender is Sabrina Cheng of the PSPC.

* **Email:** <sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* **Ariba Discovery:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17040370>

Note: The contract period is 3 years firm with 2 one-year option periods.
